Knowledge of Christ Brings Vigor to the Mind.-- Christ is the wellspring of life. That which many need is 

788 

to have a clearer knowledge of Him; they need to be patiently and kindly, yet earnestly, taught how the whole being may be thrown open to the healing agencies of heaven. When the sunlight of God's love illuminates the darkened chambers of the soul, restless weariness and dissatisfaction will cease, and satisfying joys will give vigor to the mind and health and energy to the body.--MH 247 (1905).
